name: Users2MailChimp
author: eggemplo

sections.description:
Synchronizes wordpress users with MailChimp. Select MailChimp list, group and subgroup (subscribers organized in a subgroup or according to your role), and automatically new users are added to this mailchimp group.
Add, update and delete synchronized users.

Official site: eggemplo
sections.installation:
You can either install it automatically from the WordPress admin, or do it manually:

  1. Unzip the archive and put the users2mailchimp folder into your plugins folder (/wp-content/plugins/).
  2. Activate the plugin from the Plugins menu.
sections.faq:
What options using the sync button?

It take the general options, except “Need confirm” option, which is always set to YES.

Where is setup page ?

In “Users” group menu.
Users -> Users2MailChimp

Where I get the api key?

In your Mailchimp account menu -> API keys & Authorized Apps
sections.changelog:
1.5

Compatible with WordPress 5.2.3

1.4

  • Optional “Subscribe me” message and condition.
  • More eficient synchronize

1.3

  • Added double opt-in confirmation. New checkbox in registration form.

1.2.3

  • Synchronize use “Need confirm” option.

1.2.2

  • Fix: Compatible with others mailchimp’s plugins.
  • Added spanish translation.

1.2.1

  • Fix: synchronize action doesn’t subscribes users

1.2.0

  • Added option to synchronize existing users.

1.1.0

  • Subscribers organized in a subgroup or according to your role.

1.0.1

  • Explanations added to the page setup.
  • Fix: Changed option’s names.

1.0.0

  • Start version. Synchronizes new users.
